Equipment Actions.Action 1: Greataxe, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 17 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Gore, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 13 Piercing

Abilities.Ability 1: Charge, If the Minotaur charges in a straight line towards a target and then hits it with a Gore attack, the target takes an extra Average 9 Piercing damage and could be knocked prone
Abilities.Ability 2: Labyrinthine Recall, THe Minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled
Abilities.Ability 3: Reckless, The Minotaur can enter a reckless rage, giving it advantage on all of its Melee Weapon attack rolls, and grants advantage on all Melee Weapon attack rolls against it
